EmailTemplate.name: New NPS Survey Responded
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.LastName} responded our NPS survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
Your receiving this notification because {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} responded our NPS survey.
You can review the response in the following link:
{!Contact.Latests_NPS_Survey_Responded_Link__c}
Regards,
